Title: The Harmonic Mallet
Description:
$p! Prince Anduin has somehow slipped his guards again. His control over the light is greatly increasing.

He was last seen heading to Kun-Lai Summit. He gave our mages the slip around the Valley of Emperors.

Can you find him? He insists on searching for what he claims is a counter to the Divine Bell. Perhaps you can talk some sense into him before he seizes control of your mind and has you dance your way back here.

Talk to Fennie for a ride into the mountains.
ObjectivesText: Find Anduin at the Tomb of Conquerors. Speak to Fennie Hornswaggle at Lion's Landing for transportation.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Anduin at the Tomb of Conquerors.
RewardText:
I am glad you made it, my friend. I could really use your help with what is to come. My father would prefer I remain in the safe custody of his legion.

But if there is one thing Pandaria has taught me, it is a few people in the right place at the right time can make a bigger difference than the greatest of armies.

Objectives.Text: Take Fennie's Kite to the Tomb of Conquerors
